SEARCH
Package com.petition.platform.models

Class User

java.lang.Object
com.petition.platform.models.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdminUser, CompanyUser, SimpleUser, SuperUser
@MappedSuperclass public class User extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a user in the system. This class is mapped to the database and serves as a base class for specific user types.
See Also:

    • setPassword

      public void setPassword(String password)
      Sets the password of the user. Encrypts the password using BCryptPasswordEncoder before setting.
      Parameters:
      password - The password to set.

    • setEnabled

      public void setEnabled(Boolean enabled)
      Sets the status of the user account (enabled or disabled).
      Parameters:
      enabled - True to enable the user account, false to disable.
